    • Constructor Detail

      • LSTFilter

        public LSTFilter(STStorage structure)
        Creates a new LSTFilter containing the given structure.
        Parameters:
        structure - - STStorage structure to include within the LSTFilter

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        public void insert(STPoint item)
        Inserts a point into the structure. Smart insertion is determined from the LSTFilter's smartInsert member variable
        Parameters:
        item - point to insert into the structure

      • windowPoK

        public double windowPoK(STRegion region)
        Convenience method for windowPoK where snap will be set to false
        Parameters:
        region - - spatial and temporal bounds for which to query for the PoK
        Returns:
        PoK value summarizing the coverage of the desired region

      • windowPoK

        public double windowPoK(STRegion region,
               boolean snap)
        Determines the PoK for a given STRegion
        Parameters:
        region - - spatial and temporal bounds for which to query for the PoK
        snap - - will return a PoK value ignoring empty space beyond bounds of structure
        Returns:
        PoK value summarizing the coverage of the desired region

      • pointPoK

        public double pointPoK(STPoint point)
        Retrieves the PoK for a given point. Uses the default space bound values to form a region around the point
        Parameters:
        point - - point to query around
        Returns:
        PoK value

      • findPath

        public java.util.List<STPoint> findPath(STPoint start,
                               STPoint end)
        Finds the path between two points. If the points don't match any in the structure the nearest neighbors are chosen.
        Parameters:
        start - - beginning point of path
        end - - terminating point of path
        Returns:
        list of the sequentially (temporal) ordered points

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Convenience method for clearing the structure

      • setSmartInsert

        public void setSmartInsert(boolean isSmart)
        Sets the structure's smart insert flag
        Parameters:
        isSmart - - value to set the smart insert flag to

      • getSize

        public int getSize()
        Gets the size of the structure
        Returns:
        size of the structure, number of data points

      • getAggPoK

        public void getAggPoK(double[] sum,
             java.util.List<java.lang.Double> active,
             java.util.List<java.lang.Double> rest)
        Uses the inclusion-exclusion principle to determine the aggregate probability of points Each possible combination of points is generated and summed or subtracted according to the incl-excl principle
        Parameters:
        sum - - store the result in sum[0], iteration count in sum[1]
        active - - active list of points, pass in an empty List
        rest - - remaining list of points, pass in the list of points to be computed
